scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix react-ui && npm run build --prefix react-ui
scripts.separate-server-dev: npx kill-port 3000 && npx kill-port 9001 && NODE_ENV=development concurrently "nodemon express-server/server.js" "npm start --prefix react-ui"
scripts.static-build-dev: npx kill-port 3000 && npx kill-port 9001 && npm install --prefix react-ui && npm run build --prefix react-ui && NODE_ENV=development node express-server/server.js
